Uses of Interface
org.jgrapes.core.Eligible

  • Packages that use Eligible 
    Package Description
    org.jgrapes.core
    Defines the interfaces and classes that provide the core functionality of the JGrapes event driven component framework.
    org.jgrapes.core.annotation  
    org.jgrapes.core.events  
    org.jgrapes.core.internal  
    org.jgrapes.http  
    org.jgrapes.http.annotation  
    org.jgrapes.http.demo.httpserver  
    org.jgrapes.http.demo.portlets.helloworld  
    org.jgrapes.http.events  
    org.jgrapes.http.rocker  
    org.jgrapes.http.rocker.events  
    org.jgrapes.io  
    org.jgrapes.io.events  
    org.jgrapes.io.util  
    org.jgrapes.net  
    org.jgrapes.net.events  
    org.jgrapes.portal
    The portal package provides a portal implementation based on the core, io and http packages of the JGrapes framework.
    org.jgrapes.portal.events  
    org.jgrapes.portal.freemarker  
    org.jgrapes.portlets.sysinfo  
    org.jgrapes.util  
    org.jgrapes.util.events  

    • Uses of Eligible in org.jgrapes.core

      Subinterfaces of Eligible in org.jgrapes.core 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Channel
      Classes that implements this interface can be used as a communication bus for sending events between components.
      interface  DefaultChannel
      This interface type can be used to specify a component’s channel (see Component.channel()) as channel in handler annotations.
      interface  Self
      This interface type can be used to specify the object itself as channel in handler annotations.
      Classes in org.jgrapes.core that implement Eligible 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ClassChannel
      This class is the root base class for channels that use their class (type) as value for matching (see Eligible).
      class  CompletionEvent<T extends Event<?>>
      A base class for completion events that use the completed event as their result type.
      class  Component
      This class can be used as base class for implementing a component.
      class  Event<T>
      This class is the base class for all events.
      class  HandlingErrorPrinter 
      class  NamedChannel
      This class provides channels that are identified by a name (string).
      class  NamedEvent<T>
      A class for events using a simple name as the event’s kind.
      Methods in org.jgrapes.core with parameters of type Eligible 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean HandlerScope.includes(Eligible event, Eligible[] channels) 
      boolean HandlerScope.includes(Eligible event, Eligible[] channels) 

    • Uses of Eligible in org.jgrapes.core.annotation

      Classes in org.jgrapes.core.annotation that implement Eligible 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Handler.NoChannel
      The default value for the channels parameter of the annotation.
      static class  Handler.NoEvent
      The default value for the events parameter of the annotation.

    • Uses of Eligible in org.jgrapes.core.events

      Classes in org.jgrapes.core.events that implement Eligible 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Attached
      Signals the addition of a component (or subtree) to the component tree.
      class  Detached
      Signals the removal of a component from the component tree.
      class  Error
      This event signals that an error occurred while processing an event.
      class  HandlingError
      This event signals that a throwable occurred while executing a handler.
      class  Start
      An event that signals the start of the application.
      class  Started
      The event that signals the completion of the Start event.
      class  Stop
      An event that causes an application to shut down.

    • Uses of Eligible in org.jgrapes.core.internal

      Classes in org.jgrapes.core.internal that implement Eligible 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ComponentProxy
      The ComponentProxy is a special ComponentVertex that references the object implementing the Component interface (instead of being its base class).
      class  EventBase<T>
      Provides the implementations of methods to class Event that need access to classes or methods that are visible in the implementation package only.

    • Uses of Eligible in org.jgrapes.http

      Classes in org.jgrapes.http that implement Eligible 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HttpServer
      A converter component that receives and sends byte buffers on a network channel and sends HTTP requests and receives HTTP responses on its own channel.
      class  InMemorySessionManager
      A in memory session manager.
      class  LanguageSelector
      A component that attempts to derive information about language preferences from requests in the specified scope (usually “/”) and make them available as a LanguageSelector.Selection object associated with the request event using Selection.class as association identifier.
      class  SessionManager
      A base class for session managers.
      class  StaticContentDispatcher
      A dispatcher for requests for static content, usually files.

      Fired when a protocol upgrade was successful.
      class  WebSocketAccepted
      Indicates that a component has accepted a GetRequest with a header that requested an upgrade to the WebSocket protocol.

      An event that provides the close information when a WebSockt is closed.

    • Uses of Eligible in org.jgrapes.io

      Subinterfaces of Eligible in org.jgrapes.io 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IOSubchannel
      Represents an I/O subchannel.
      Classes in org.jgrapes.io that implement Eligible 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FileStorage
      A component that reads from or writes to a file.
      static class  IOSubchannel.DefaultSubchannel
      A simple implementation of IOSubchannel.
      class  NioDispatcher
      A helper component that provides the central hub for non blocking I/O components.

    • Uses of Eligible in org.jgrapes.io.events

      Classes in org.jgrapes.io.events that implement Eligible 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Close
      This event causes the initiator of an I/O channel to shutdown the channel.
      class  Closed
      This event signals that an I/O subchannel will no longer be used.
      class  FileOpened 
      class  Input<T extends ManagedBuffer<?>>
      This event signals that a new chunk of data has successfully been obtained from some source.
      class  IOError
      A special kind of Error that signals problems during IO.
      class  NioRegistration
      Signal a registration request to a registry.
      static class  NioRegistration.Completed 
      class  Opened
      This event signals that an I/O resource has successfully been opened (usually in response to some …Open event).
      class  Output<T extends ManagedBuffer<?>>
      This event signals that a new chunk of internally generated data is to be forwarded to some destination.
      class  SaveInput
      Causes the FileStorage component to write the data from all Input events on the channel that this event is fired on to a file until an event with the end of record flag set is sent on the channel.
      class  SaveOutput
      Causes the FileStorage component to write the data from all Output events on the channel that this event is fired on to a file until an event with the end of record flag set is sent on the channel.
      class  StreamFile
      Causes the content of a file to be streamed as a sequence of Output events (terminated by an event with the end of record flag set) on the channel that this event is fired on.

    • Uses of Eligible in org.jgrapes.io.util

      Classes in org.jgrapes.io.util that implement Eligible 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LinkedIOSubchannel
      Provides an I/O subchannel that is linked to another I/O subchannel.

    • Uses of Eligible in org.jgrapes.net

      Classes in org.jgrapes.net that implement Eligible 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SslServer
      A component that receives and send byte buffers on an encrypted channel and sends and receives the corresponding decrypted data on its own channel.
      class  TcpServer
      Provides a TCP server.

    • Uses of Eligible in org.jgrapes.net.events

      Classes in org.jgrapes.net.events that implement Eligible 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Accepted
      This event signals that a new connection has been made by a client.
      class  Ready
      Signals that a server has bound to a socket address and is ready to accept connections.

    • Uses of Eligible in org.jgrapes.portal

      Classes in org.jgrapes.portal that implement Eligible 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractPortlet
      Provides a base class for implementing portlet components that maintain the portlet’s state in the browser session.
      class  KVStoreBasedPortalPolicy
      A component that restores the portal layout, using key/value events for persisting the data between sessions.
      class  Portal 
      class  PortalLocalBackedKVStore 
      class  PortalSession
      The server side representation of a window in the browser that displays a portal page (a portal session).
      class  PortalView 

    • Uses of Eligible in org.jgrapes.portal.events

      Classes in org.jgrapes.portal.events that implement Eligible 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AddPortletRequest
      Sent to the portal (server) if a new portlet instance of a given type should be added to the portal page.
      class  AddPortletType
      Adds a portlet type with its global resources (JavaScript and/or CSS) to the portal page.
      class  DeletePortlet
      A notification (as defined by the JSON RPC specification) to be sent to the portlet view (the browser).
      class  DeletePortletRequest
      A request to delete a portlet instance.
      class  JsonInput
      A JSON notification from the portal view (browser) to the portal.
      class  JsonOutput
      A JSON request from the server to the browser.
      class  LastPortalLayout
      Sent by the server to the browser in response to PortalPrepared (see this event’s description for details).
      class  NotifyPortletModel
      A decoded notification (as defined by the JSON RPC specification) that invokes a method on a portlet model.
      class  NotifyPortletView
      A notification (as defined by the JSON RPC specification) to be sent to the portlet view (the browser).
      class  PortalConfigured
      This event is the completed event for the PortalPrepared event.
      class  PortalLayoutChanged
      Notifies the server about a change of the portal layout.
      class  PortalPrepared
      This event is the completion event for the PortalReady event.
      class  PortalReady
      Signals the successful loading of the portal structure in the browser.
      class  PortletResourceRequest
      An event that signals the request of a resource by the portal (browser).
      class  PortletResourceResponse
      A response to a PortletResourceRequest.
      class  RenderPortlet
      Send to the portal page for adding or updating a complete portlet representation.
      class  RenderPortletRequest
      Sent to the portal (server) if an existing portlet instance should be updated.
      class  RenderPortletRequestBase
      The base class for events that result in a portlet being rendered.
      class  SetLocale
      Signals that the locale for the portal has changed.
      class  SetTheme
      Signals that the theme for the portal has changed.

      This component provides a store for application preferences.

    • Uses of Eligible in org.jgrapes.util.events

      Classes in org.jgrapes.util.events that implement Eligible 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  KeyValueStoreData
      Defines an optional completion event for a KeyValueStoreQuery.
      class  KeyValueStoreQuery
      A query event for a key/value store.
      class  KeyValueStoreUpdate
      An event that triggers updates or deletions in a key/value store.
      class  PreferencesInitialized
      A special PreferencesUpdate event that is used for reporting the properties on startup.
      class  PreferencesRemoval
      Indicates the removal of all preference starting with the given paths.
      class  PreferencesUpdate
      An event to indicate that preferences values have been updated.
